 Game information:
 =================

 AR-K is a classical point and click adventure with an updated twist.

 Is the world where Alicia Van Volish lives. She is  a  former  cop  turned
 into a journalism student who wakes up after  a  one-night  stand  with  a
 terrible hangover and a lot of questions: How much did she drink? Did  she
 really take that guy home with her? What was his name? And what,  exactly,
 is the Golden Sphere, the mysterious object that seems the source  of  all
 Alicias woes? And what was that guys name again?


 NOTES:
 ======

 This release includes "Episode One: Gone With The Sphere" as  an  improved
 version compared to the  2011  release  from  FANiSO.  As  well,  the  new
 "Episode Two: The Girl Who Wasnt There" is also included. There are  four
 into total episodes planned.


 Installation Information:
 =========================

 * Burn or mount
 * Install
 * Play the game

 NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall.
